[dngo@mercury A6]$ gcc -ansi -Wall linker.c -o linker
[dngo@mercury A6]$ ./masm_mrd -o < main.asm > main.obj
[dngo@mercury A6]$ ./masm_mrd -o < xbsywt.asm > xbsywt.obj
[dngo@mercury A6]$ ./masm_mrd -o < rbsywt.asm > rbsywt.obj
[dngo@mercury A6]$ ./masm_mrd -o < readint.asm > readint.obj
[dngo@mercury A6]$ ./masm_mrd -o < writeint.asm > writeint.obj
[dngo@mercury A6]$ ./masm_mrd -o < addints.asm > addints.obj
[dngo@mercury A6]$ ./masm_mrd -o < writestr.asm > writestr.obj
[dngo@mercury A6]$ ./linker main.obj xbsywt.obj rbsywt.obj readint.obj writeint.obj addints.obj writestr.obj > main.exe
[dngo@mercury A6]$ ./mic1 prom_mrd.dat main.exe 0 2048
